feed.title: AutoKitteh Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.15.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: make session cookie http only by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1207
  • fix(jira): remove support for issue_property_set and issue_property_deleted by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1208
  • fix(jira): ignore irrelevant events + cosmetic tweaks by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1209

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.15.7...v0.15.8

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.15.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: call cleanup once pythonrt is done by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1211

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.15.8...v0.15.9

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.15.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: allow redispatch in authz by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1210
  • fix(python): deal with unpicklable exceptions correctly when not caught by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1212

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.15.9...v0.15.10

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.15.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: add logging to prevent silent errors + log all events in salesforce by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1218

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.15.10...v0.15.11

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.15.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(salesforce): ignore self-triggered events based on user_id instead of changeOrigin by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1219
  • fix: change trigger unique name on trigger delete by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1221
  • feat: convert jwt to rsa and expose jwks endpoint by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1217

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.15.11...v0.15.12
